tool.name: Culture Medium Calculator
tool.description: Calculate and generate a desired quantity of culture medium solution

param.name: desired_volume
param.label: Desired final volume of culture medium (ml)
param.help: For MSG-Liquid, this will be overridden if number of flasks is specified

param.name: num_flasks
param.label: Number of flasks (for MSG-Liquid only)
param.help: Each flask will contain 50ml. If specified, this will override the desired volume for MSG-Liquid medium type.

tool.help:
This tool calculates and generates a desired quantity of specific culture medium solution by taking the stock solutions and powder reagents.
The output includes a step-by-step protocol with:
- Calculated amounts of all reagents
- Instructions for preparation
- Checkboxes for tracking progress
The output is generated in TXT format and includes the date and time of generation.
**Available culture medium types:**
- **MSG**: Original Becwar et al. (1989) medium - Solid medium with 3 g/l gelrite - Distributed in Petri dishes with 10ml each - Requires L-glutamine addition after sterilization
- **MSGm**: Modified MSG medium for maturation with additional components - Contains sorbitol (30 g/l) - Increased gelrite (10 g/l) - Additional ABA (12 ml/l) - Distributed in Petri dishes with 10ml each - Requires L-glutamine and ABA addition after sterilization
- **MSG-Liquid**: Liquid version of MSG medium - No gelrite added - Distributed in Erlenmeyer flasks with 50ml each - L-glutamine added at 2.5ml per flask after sterilization - **Note**: For MSG-Liquid, if you specify the number of flasks, the desired volume will be automatically calculated
- **BM**: Gupta and Pullman (1991) medium - Contains additional hydrolyzed casein (0.5 g/l) - Double microsalts concentration (20 ml/l) - Double vitamins concentration (2 ml/l) - Distributed in tubes with 10ml each - Does not require L-glutamine addition after sterilization
Developed by Leandro F. de Oliveira (2025).
